channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Dernière ligne droite pour profiter des prix cassés sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs aux dernières heures des soldes d’hiver
item.description: L'ultime démarque des soldes d'hiver vient de démarrer avec son cortège d'offres sur les téléviseurs dernier cri et les vidéoprojecteurs bardés de nouvelles technologies. Envie d'une image flambant neuve ? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs bons plans qui crèvent l'écran.

item.title: Geekom’s “exceptionally good” AX8 Max mini PC with Ryzen 7 8745HS, 32GB of DDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD is now under $650 - but it won't stay that price for long
item.description: Geekom AX8 Max mini PC is powered by AMD’s Ryzen 7 8745HS, with 32GB of DDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD and it's now priced under $650.

item.title: Independent auditors confirm NordVPN never stores your data – for the 6th time
item.description: NordVPN’s latest no-logs audit once again validates the company’s long-standing privacy claim: it doesn’t retain any identifying logs of its users. Here's why it matters.

item.title: C’est le grand déstockage chez Xiaomi pour le dernier jour des soldes
item.description: À quelques heures de la fin des soldes, Xiaomi continue de proposer d’excellentes affaires sur une large sélection de produits. Si l’un des modèles Xiaomi vous fait de l’œil, c’est le moment ou jamais d’en profiter avant la fin de l'évènement.

item.title: L’indémodable manette sans fil Xbox revient à petit prix pour le dernier jour des soldes
item.description: Microsoft a su faire son trou avec sa manette Xbox au design si efficace porté par ses deux joysticks asymétriques. PC Componentes vous propose de l'acquérir pour 49,57 euros.

item.title: Ian McKellen May Have Revealed a Big Magneto Moment in ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
item.description: Plus, Maika Monroe has a hopeful update on the 'It Follows' sequel.

item.title: Fitbit’s founders launch a new platform for monitoring your entire family’s health
item.description: James Park and Eric Friedman, the co-founders of Fitbit who left Google two years ago, have announced a new venture called Luffu. Described as an "intelligent family care system," Luffu collects and logs health and medical information from connected devices, other platforms like Apple Health and Fitbit, and details shared by family members through voice […]...

item.title: Still looking for a Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold? Here's the latest restock info and some excellent value alternatives to consider
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is officially sold out – here are the latest details on restocks, plus today's best options for alternative models.

item.title: I tested Acer Nitro 18 AI gaming laptop, and it looks like great value considering its spec — but I found some issues that might spoil your fun
item.description: The Acer Nitro 18 AI is large and powerful – but how does it stack up to its rivals?

item.title: Well, Astronauts Won’t Be Going Back to the Moon This Month
item.description: A hydrogen leak during the wet dress rehearsal for Artemis 2 has forced NASA to forego the February launch window and work toward March instead.

item.title: Humans are infiltrating the social network for AI bots
item.description: Ordinary social networks face a constant onslaught of chatbots pretending to be human. A new social platform for AI agents may face the opposite problem: getting clogged up by humans pretending to post as bots. Moltbook - a website meant for conversations between agents from the platform OpenClaw - went viral this weekend for its […]

item.title: PayPal hires HP’s Enrique Lores as its new CEO
item.description: PayPal is appointing CFO and COO Jamie Miller as interim CEO until March 1.

item.title: Peak XV says internal disagreement led to partner exits as it doubles down on AI
item.description: Peak XV is transitioning board roles and opening a U.S. office while continuing to view India as its largest market.

item.title: Disney says Josh D’Amaro will replace Bob Iger as CEO
item.description: Disney has picked a successor for longtime CEO Bob Iger. On Tuesday, the entertainment giant announced that its theme parks head, Josh D'Amaro, will take over as CEO on March 18th, 2026. Rumors about Iger's replacement have been swirling for more than a year now. After a 15-year-long tenure as Disney's CEO, Iger returned from […]

item.title: Call of Duty tries to block XIM and Cronus cheaters again
item.description: Activision is trying to crack down on third-party hardware cheating devices in Call of Duty again. Both Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 have been plagued by players using devices like XIM, Cronus Zen, and ReaSnow S1 to enable unfair advantages that exploit aim assist, and now Activision is introducing […]

item.title: C’est quoi Codex, la nouvelle application d’OpenAI qui veut transformer votre façon de travailler sur Mac ?
item.description: La firme à l'origine de ChatGPT dévoile une application sur Mac permettant de centraliser la gestion de plusieurs agents IA.

item.title: France 2 UHD passe au HDR10+ et au Dolby Vision pour les grands événements sportifs
item.description: Depuis le 26 janvier 2026, France 2 UHD a adopté le HDR10+ dynamique en partenariat avec Samsung, marquant une première européenne en diffusion sportive UHD HDR10+ Live et préparant les grands rendez‑vous sportifs de l’année. Mais ce n’est pas tout, car la chaîne diffusera également en Dolby Vision.

item.title: Panera Bread data breach much more serious than we thought - over 5 million customers were hit, new reports claim
item.description: Panera Bread customer data leaked on the dark web, allowing researchers to determine how many people were hit.

item.title: Presque 1 milliard de comptes : Epic Games montre à quel point il a grandi
item.description: Epic Games dévoile son bilan de l'année 2025 et sa feuille de route pour 2026. La société met en avant une croissance majeure, qu'il faut peut-être tempérer.

item.title: Sony imagine une nouvelle manette révolutionnaie sans aucun bouton physique et qui prévoit vos actions
item.description: Sony vient de voir un de ses brevets validés pour une manette à écran tactile sans le moindre bouton. De quoi offrir une modularité exemplaire aux joueurs.

item.title: Epic Games Store : 8 ans après, les fonctionnalités que tout le monde attendait arrivent enfin
item.description: En 2026, l'Epic Games Store va accueillir de nombreuses améliorations et fonctionnalités attendues depuis bien longtemps.

item.title: Nintendo’s Virtual Boy Recreation Reminds Us Gaming Doesn’t Have to Be Fun
item.description: You'll enjoy Nintendo's $100 Virtual Boy Switch 2 accessory if you look at it like a gaming archaeologist.

item.title: ‘The Muppet Show’ Returns for a Cute and Nostalgic Special
item.description: The one-off episode celebrates the series’ 50th anniversary with special guest (and Miss Piggy superfan) Sabrina Carpenter.

item.title: Nintendo’s 2026 Games Lineup Is Odd, but Not as Odd as the Wonder Flower
item.description: The Wonder Flower has infiltrated every party game Nintendo has made, even the upcoming 'Mario Tennis Fever.'

item.title: Nintendo’s Virtual Boy Is a Silly but Fun Blast From the Past
item.description: This $100 accessory adds a little bit of that Nintendo quirkiness to the otherwise no-nonsense Switch 2.

item.title: Fortnite is about to get a lot more gaming crossovers
item.description: Fortnite is going to be getting a lot more crossovers featuring characters from video games. As part of the Epic Games Store's year in review for 2025, Epic shared details about its official program for developers that will give people who purchase their game on the Epic Games Store a related cosmetic they can use […]

item.title: I watched The Muppet Show on Disney+ and found it charming but old-fashioned –luckily, Sabrina Carpenter mostly saves the day
item.description: Disney+ is, with The Studio's Seth Rogen's help, relaunching The Muppet show – but this revival, while charming, may be too much like the original.

item.title: I played a demo of Pragmata on the Nintendo Switch 2, and it just went from my least highly anticipated game this year to one of the most exciting releases coming soon
item.description: Pragmata might be the sleeper hit of the year, and it feels right at home on the Switch 2

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem runs so smoothly on Nintendo Switch 2 that I blasphemed in a room full of my peers
item.description: Capcom is flexing its superior optimization skills with its upcoming Resident Evil Requiem release, and it might make you reconsider the platform you first play it on...

item.title: Mario Tennis Fever preview: A racket-smashing blast
item.description: New Mario sports games typically only come around once in a generation. So to get a fresh installment of tennis featuring a deep roster of characters this early in the Switch 2's lifecycle is rather exciting. And after getting a chance to play Mario Tennis Fever prior to its official release on February 12, the best entry to the franchise yet might only be a couple of weeks away. Once again, Mario Tennis Fever relies on the series' familiar mix of topspin, slice and flat (power) shots used in previous games. The big new mechanic for this title is that instead of Zone Shots from Mario Tennis Ac...

item.title: The Switch 2's Virtual Boy is a tribute to Nintendo's wackiest console
item.description: Even in 2026, VR still feels like tech that isn't quite ready for prime time. When Nintendo released the original Virtual Boy way back in 1995, it was hard for my 10-year-old brain to comprehend a 3D console with a bipod, a facemask and a monochrome red display. Then, when you factor in weak sales that led to the system being discontinued after only a year, you end up with a gadget that felt more like a mythical creature than something you could actually buy. But that's changing later this month when the Virtual Boy returns as an add-on for the Switch 2. After getting an early demo of Nintendo...

item.title: NASA moves Artemis 2 launch to March after hydrogen leak during testing
item.description: NASA started making the final preparations for the Artemis 2 mission in early January, with the hopes of opening its launch window as soon as February 6. After issues showed up during the mission’s wet dress rehearsal in the early hours of February 3, however, the agency had to push back its earliest launch opportunity to March. “With more than three years between SLS launches, we fully anticipated encountering challenges. That is precisely why we conduct a wet dress rehearsal. These tests are designed to surface issues before flight and set up launch day with the highest probability of succes...

item.title: Vercel rebuilt v0 to tackle the 90% problem: Connecting AI-generated code to existing production infrastructure, not prototypes
item.description: Before Claude Code wrote its first line of code, Vercel was already in the vibe coding space with its v0 service.The basic idea behind the original v0, which launched in 2024, was essentially to be version 0. That is, the earliest version of an application, helping developers solve the blank canvas problem. Developers could prompt their way to a user interface (UI) scaffolding that looked good, but the code was disposable. Getting those prototypes into production required rewrites.More than 4 million people have used v0 to build millions of prototypes, but the platform was missing elements re...

item.title: Elon Musk fusionne SpaceX et xAi pour « accélérer l’avenir de l’humanité »
item.description: Elon Musk fusionne SpaceX et xAI pour bâtir un géant de la tech spatiale et de l’intelligence artificielle. Selon lui, c'est la première brique d'un empire futuriste intitulé « Sentient Sun ».

item.title: Le Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra et l’iPhone Air sont en soldes ! Plus que quelques heures pour profiter de ces smartphones à prix cassé
item.description: La dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver est lancée ! Il ne reste donc plus qu'une semaine avant la fin des promotions programmée pour le 3 février. Il reste donc encore un peu de temps pour se décider sur le nouveau smartphone qu'on souhaiterait avoir en poche.

item.title: Raspberry Pi augmente encore ses prix, plombé par la flambée du coût de la mémoire
item.description: Deuxième hausse des prix en deux mois : Raspberry Pi est une fois de plus forcé d'augmenter les étiquettes de plusieurs de ses ordinateurs en raison de la flambée des coûts de la mémoire.

item.title: La recharge des voitures électriques BYD « aussi rapide qu’un plein d’essence » devient encore plus rapide
item.description: En 2025, BYD présentait son chargeur mégawatt capable de délivrer 1 360 kW. La seconde génération de ces chargeurs arrive en Chine avec une technologie améliorée permettant de recharger encore plus rapidement les voitures électriques.

item.title: Google Home finally adds support for buttons
item.description: Google Home users, your long nightmare is over. The platform has finally added support for buttons. The release notes for a February 2 update state that several new starter conditions for automations are now available, including "Switch or button pressed." Smart buttons are physical, programmable switches that you can press to trigger automations or control […]...

item.title: Samsung frappe fort pour le dernier jour des soldes : les 15 dernières pépites à saisir
item.description: Dernière ligne droite pour les soldes d’hiver et, avec elle, la dernière occasion de profiter des meilleures promotions Samsung. Smartphones, téléviseurs, écrans PC ou encore écouteurs : la marque sud-coréenne affiche encore des prix fortement bas. Retrouvez ici nos meilleurs deals à ne surtout pas laisser passer avant la fin définitive de l’événement. ...

item.title: Quel hub USB-C choisir pour votre PC portable ou MacBook ?
item.description: Si vous achetez un PC portable, il y a fort à parier que celui-ci propose un ou plusieurs ports USB-C... et peut-être rien de plus niveau connectique. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs hubs (ou dongle) USB-C.

item.title: Pour allier votre passion du gaming et d’Hatsune Miku, voici la souris Asus TUF Mini Wireless à -30 %
item.description: Cette souris est le fruit d'une collaboration entre Asus et Crypton Future Media pour proposer un produit aussi design que performant, vendu 59,95 euros au lieu de 84,96 euros sur materiel.net.

item.title: TurboTax Deluxe is on sale for $45 before tax season
item.description: Tax season is fast approaching, and unfortunately for 2026, Direct File isn't an option anymore. The free, government-provided service was shut down, so you'll need to look to other federal programs, including IRS Free File, to file your paperwork. If you don't qualify for Free File, TurboTax might be your best bet for a relatively cheap, efficient way to file your taxes. While it pains us to suggest you give money to a company that has spent decades lobbying to ensure America's tax system remains a nightmare, we can at least help you save a bit of cash if you've determined TurboTax is a neces...

item.title: Sea of Remnants has 400+ named NPCs in its open world, each 'with their own individual story arcs' that can be altered by your actions
item.description: Sea of Remnant's open world will feature 400+ named NPCs with individual story arcs that can be influenced by the player's actions.

item.title: 7 Best Shower Filters (2026), WIRED Tested and Approved
item.description: We tested leading filtered shower heads, from Rorra to Canopy to Jolie. The winners were clear.

item.title: Les Status Audio Pro X veulent redéfinir l’expérience audio sans fil haut de gamme avec leur technologie à triple driver hybride
item.description: Status Audio lance les Pro X, des écouteurs true wireless dotés d'une architecture triple driver hybride, de la certification Hi-Res Audio et d'une technologie de réduction de bruit. Ces écouteurs promettent une qualité sonore audiophile pour les utilisateurs exigeants. On fait le point.

item.title: The 8BitDo Pro 3 Bluetooth Controller is down to a new all-time low
item.description: If you've been inside all winter gaming then it might be time to upgrade your gear. Right now, the 8Bitdo Pro 3 Bluetooth Controller is available for just over $48, down from $70. The 31 percent discount is the lowest price we've seen yet for the controller. Notably, the sale is only available on the Gray model. The new 8Bitdo Pro 3 came out in August and offers TMR Joysticks with a 12-bit ADC sampling chip. It also has a Trigger Mode Switch, 2 Pro paddle buttons and swappable magnetic ABXY buttons for moving between the Switch and Xbox layouts. Plus, it has an integrated charging dock. This...

item.title: How discounting hurts long-term loyalty and profits
item.description: Retailers that rely on markdowns drive short-term transactions but miss out on future profits. Discounting has been part of retail’s toolkit for decades, and it can be effective, especially during high-stakes shopping seasons. But as promotions become more frequent across the industry, companies are taking a closer look at the downside: Short-term sales gains don’t always come with long-term loyalty or durable margins, and customers remember how a brand made them feel far more than what they saved at checkout....

item.title: Is this the ultimate home theater? A micro-LED wall with cinema-certified visual quality, and a 14.8.8-channel built-in sound system — yes, you are reading those numbers correctly
item.description: The Luxury Immersion Cinema promises to redefine what you can expect from your luxury home theater

item.title: As AI fragments, enterprise control is the next battleground
item.description: Leaders must build governance and visibility before complexity turns into risk.

item.title: Elon Musk says a 'sentient sun' built from a million satellites is the aim of the SpaceX and xAI merger – but big questions remain
item.description: SpaceX and xAI are teaming up, which should speed up efforts to move AI infrastructure out into space.

item.title: Palantir’s stock price is back on the rise. This 1 factor may determine if shares keep going up
item.description: The data analysis software firm is riding high on better-than-expected growth and AI optimism, but tech earnings season isn’t over yet. Shares in Palantir Technologies (Nasdaq: PLTR) are rising this morning, one day after the AI data analysis software company with significant U.S. government contracts reported better-than-expected Q4 earnings. Here’s what you need to know about Palantir’s latest results and its rising stock price....

item.title: This powerful wireless hi-fi speaker has all the modern connections you could want — and a touchscreen to control things easily
item.description: The Primare Allt-i-Ett is a jack of all trades, and perhaps a master of them too, with basically every spec you'd ever want.

item.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI - although business years get a slight stay of execution
item.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued from March 1, 2026, with Creative Cloud Pro apps picking up the pieces.

item.title: Perquisition chez X en France : le parquet de Paris convoque Elon Musk
item.description: Le parquet de Paris a réquisitionné ce mardi les locaux français de X (anciennement Twitter), dans le cadre d'une enquête faisant suite à des signalements remontant à janvier 2025. En parallèle, une convocation a été envoyée à Elon Musk, à des fins d'audition libre.

item.title: Will Trump gut the Kennedy Center? What to know about his construction plans for the D.C. institution
item.description: Sen. Sheldon Whitehouse said Trump’s planned closure of the Kennedy Center is part of his “demolition tour of Washington.” President Donald Trump said Monday that he’s “not ripping down” the Kennedy Center but insisted the performing arts venue needs to shut down for about two years for construction and other work without patrons coming and going and getting in the way.The comments strongly suggested that he intends to gut the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts as part of the process.“I’m not ripping it down,” the Republican president told reporters in the Oval Office. “I’ll be us...

item.title: Save on the Disney+ and Hulu bundle: Get one month for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: Coup double pour B&You avec ce forfait mobile 100 Go pas cher et un Giga jackpot de 100 000 euros à gagner [Sponso]
item.description: B&You démarre l’année 2026 en force avec son offre combinée mobile + fibre qui revient au total à 31,98 euros par mois, sans engagement. Voici tout ce qu’elle comprend pour un tarif aussi contenu.

item.title: On vous dit tout sur OpenClaw, la nouvelle IA autonome dont tout le monde parle
item.description: OpenClaw, c'est le nom du nouvel agent IA qui fait le buzz sur Internet. Très populaire auprès des développeurs, il est capable de contrôler tout votre ordinateur à votre place. On vous dit tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur le projet, de ses possibilités à ses dérives.

item.title: One of ‘Star Wars’ Biggest Recent Reveals Was Inspired by ‘Lord of the Rings’
item.description: The introduction of Darth Plagueis in 'The Acolyte' was meant to be like Gollum.

item.title: A Continuous Glucose Monitor Might Help You Lose Weight (2026)
item.description: Signos is the first FDA-cleared, AI-enabled system that uses CGMs to nudge you towards healthier behaviors.

item.title: Aluminium: Why Google’s Android for PC launch may be messy and controversial
item.description: "Finally." That was my first reaction when I heard Google would combine Android and ChromeOS into a single operating system. Android has long struggled on tablets, and ChromeOS always felt like too much of a stripped-down alternative to tempt me away from Windows and Mac. So last week, it was exciting to see a leaked […]

item.title: Is your calendar a mess? This app solved my schedule woes on all my devices
item.description: Fantastical is a cross-platform calendar app that’s stuffed with features. Here’s why I love it.

item.title: YouTube now blocking background playback on mobile browsers
item.description: YouTube has started to block third-party mobile browsers from using a background playback loophole. Background playback is supposed to be limited to YouTube Premium subscribers through the official iOS or Android app, but many people have been using browsers like Brave, Vivaldi, and Edge to get background playback without a subscription. Not anymore. "Background playback […]...
